name: rpgjs
description: RPG JS is a framework for creating RPGs and MMORPG

scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.dev: cd packages/sample && npm run build:server && cd ../.. && concurrently -n rpgjs,client,server,nodemon "npm:watch:*" "cd packages/sample && npm run dev:client" "cd packages/sample && npm run dev:server" "cd packages/sample && npm run dev:nodemon"

author: Samuel Ronce
